income_messages:
From: a*****************0@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-01 18:41:26
SUBJECT: Dear  Sir,
Dear  Sir,
I am Adnan Menderes Yayla, Chief Financial Officer & Executive Vice President QNB Finansbank, Istanbul office Turkey, I am pleased to get across to you for a very urgent and profitable business proposal which I believe will profit the both of us after completion, I contacted you after going through your profile  that you might be capable of handling this business transaction without betrayal, There is this client of mine Mr. Roger Ian Wright a US businessman, founder of a Sao Paulo-based investment company and Owner of  ENGEN OIL AND GAS COMPANY LTD made a fixed deposit with my bank in January 2009 for 36 calendar months, valued at (US$ 20,500,000)Sixty Seven Million, Five Hundred Thousand United State Dollars Only, The due date for this deposit contract was the 2nd of April 2012,Mr. Roger Ian Wright, his wife and his two children all died in a plane crash in Sao Paulo Brazil.
You can find below the links pertaining to this accident
http: // www. abc.net.au/news/stories/2009/05/23/2579118.htm?section=justin
All attempts to trace his next of kin were fruitless, My position here at my office requires me to investigate and provide the Next of Kin or Business Partner, I therefore made further investigations and discovered that Mr. Roger Ian Wright did not declare any next of kin or relation in all his official documents including his deposit documents in my bank, According to Turkish Law the money will be reverted to the ownership of the Turkish government after 12 years if nobody applies to claim the fund, To prevent this from happening I have decided to seek your assistance to have you stand as his Business Associate so that the said fund (US$ 20.5 Million USD) would be released in your name as the next of kin and paid into your account, All documents and proof that will have you claim this funds without stress will be forwarded to you upon your response to this mail.
Your immediate response will be appreciated.
Sincerely,
Chief Financial Officer & Executive
Vice President QNB Finansbank Turkey
From: a*****************0@gmail.com
To: i*****7@mail.wltechinc.top
Time: 2023-03-01 20:33:53
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Dear Sir
Thank you very much for your response.
May I humbly inform you that nothing will be done illegally, This
transaction is confidential and requires trust, dedication from you if you
are ready to make this business a success. I am under the believe that my
sharing ratio is accepted by you, 50/50 is a fair deal, I want you to bear
one thing in mind that this Transaction is 100% risk free and secured once
you follow my instructions, what i have to do is to place your details and
personal information in our bank record and online Database system and
registered you as next of kin to the account of Late Mr. Roger Ian Wright.
The Information i required to proceed on this transaction are your personal
details as stated below.
1. FULL NAME
2. DATE OF BIRTH
3. OCCUPATION
4. CONTACT ADDRESS
5. PHONE NUMBER
6. COUNTRY
In receipt of the above-mentioned information, I will draft an application
letter to you, which you will use to apply to QNB Finansbank Istanbul
turkey for the claim, But most Importantly, I will like you to assure me
that you will not betray this trust and confidence that am about to repose
on you.
Finally, I am hoping to meet you and your family as soon as we get the fund
transferred into your account for disbursement and investments purposes.
Await your response so that I can proceed.
Sincerely
Adnan Menderes Yayla
Chief Financial Officer & Executive
Vice President QNB Finansbank Turkey
From: a*****************0@gmail.com

Time: 2023-03-01 21:04:25
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,

From: a*****************0@gmail.com
To: i*****7@mail.wltechinc.top
Time: 2023-03-01 22:18:58
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Good day Mr Donald and thank you for your feedback.
My plan is to place your details into our banking system database when you
sent it to register you as next of kin and partner to Late Mr. Roger Ian
Wright and this will take 2 Working days. When I am done I will send you
our bank contact details so that you can apply for the claim of funds. With
this you can have access to the funds within the shortest time possible.
And I want you to know that it is %100 risk free so you don't have anything
to worry about.
Note that this must be confidential between both of us as none of the bank
officials should know that I am aware of this transaction and also send me
your whatsapp number for easy communication and mutual understanding.
From: a*****************0@gmail.com
To: i*****7@mail.wltechinc.top
Time: 2023-03-01 23:25:45
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
I have told you about my plans already but if you are not interested is
okay with me, Thank you.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Dear  Sir,
conversations.body:
Dear  Sir,
I am Adnan Menderes Yayla, Chief Financial Officer & Executive Vice President QNB Finansbank, Istanbul office Turkey, I am pleased to get across to you for a very urgent and profitable business proposal which I believe will profit the both of us after completion, I contacted you after going through your profile  that you might be capable of handling this business transaction without betrayal, There is this client of mine Mr. Roger Ian Wright a US businessman, founder of a Sao Paulo-based investment company and Owner of  ENGEN OIL AND GAS COMPANY LTD made a fixed deposit with my bank in January 2009 for 36 calendar months, valued at (US$ 20,500,000)Sixty Seven Million, Five Hundred Thousand United State Dollars Only, The due date for this deposit contract was the 2nd of April 2012,Mr. Roger Ian Wright, his wife and his two children all died in a plane crash in Sao Paulo Brazil.
You can find below the links pertaining to this accident
http: // www. abc.net.au/news/stories/2009/05/23/2579118.htm?section=justin
All attempts to trace his next of kin were fruitless, My position here at my office requires me to investigate and provide the Next of Kin or Business Partner, I therefore made further investigations and discovered that Mr. Roger Ian Wright did not declare any next of kin or relation in all his official documents including his deposit documents in my bank, According to Turkish Law the money will be reverted to the ownership of the Turkish government after 12 years if nobody applies to claim the fund, To prevent this from happening I have decided to seek your assistance to have you stand as his Business Associate so that the said fund (US$ 20.5 Million USD) would be released in your name as the next of kin and paid into your account, All documents and proof that will have you claim this funds without stress will be forwarded to you upon your response to this mail.
Your immediate response will be appreciated.
Sincerely,
Chief Financial Officer & Executive
Vice President QNB Finansbank Turkey

4. CONTACT ADDRESS
5. PHONE NUMBER
6. COUNTRY
In receipt of the above-mentioned information, I will draft an application
letter to you, which you will use to apply to QNB Finansbank Istanbul
